name: preferredPasteboardType(from:restrictedToTypesFrom:)
desc: Returns whatever type on the pasteboard would be most preferred for copying data.
declaration:
func preferredPasteboardType(from availableTypes: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType], 
       restrictedToTypesFrom allowedTypes: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType]?) -> NSPasteboard.PasteboardType?
